data.name: syd
data.description: A package to help you share your data by making GUIs the easiest thing in the world!

evidence: "A package to help you share your data!" and usage via `from syd import make_viewer` indicate it is a reusable Python package imported by other code, not just a standalone app.

"Syd is a system for creating a data viewing GUI that you can view in a jupyter notebook or in a web browser." This supports that it is tooling to visualize data, i.e., supporting research workflows rather than performing domain-specific analysis itself.
